title: animate-canvas
description: A minimal utility class for frame-independent Canvas2D animations.

title: vec2
description: An intuitive, lightweight 2d vector library with built-in canvas support.

title: boids-simulation
description: Implementation of Craig Reynold's Boids Algorithm featuring reproduction & predetors along with an instinctive UI to tweak relevant proterties.

title: fractal visualizer
description: This project should demonstrate an artistic side of math by generating and redrawing fractals based on user defined variables.

title: custcur
description: A lightweight, highly customizable cursor event framework for the web.
